opendial.bn.distribs.continuous.functions

Class KernelDensityFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.distribs.continuous.functions.KernelDensityFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DensityFunction

    public class KernelDensityFunction
extends java.lang.Object
implements DensityFunction
    Density function represented as a Gaussian kernel of data points. The distribution is more exactly a Product KDE (a multivariate extension of classical KDE).
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-02-28 23:12:56 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
